column4: is there a way to remove chat/gwibber from the mail icon on the top right?
Remove gwibber?  I think the package is gwibber-service.  Ditto for Empathy.  That might cause dependency problems with ubuntu-desktop, though.
well is there a way to remove it from the mail menu on the top right?
I seem to remember there being a way, but I'm afraid I don't remember what it is.
